exercises.name: Standing Quad Stretch
instructions: Stand tall with feet hip-width apart
Shift weight to left leg and bend right knee, bringing heel toward glutes
Grab right ankle or foot with right hand
Keep knees together and hips square
Hold, then switch sides
cues: Use a wall for balance if needed

exercises.name: Lying Quad Stretch
instructions: Lie on your right side with legs stacked
Bend left knee and grab left ankle with left hand
Gently pull heel toward glutes
Keep hips stacked and core engaged
Hold, then switch sides
cues: Keep bottom leg slightly bent for stability

exercises.name: Standing Hamstring Stretch
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart
Step right foot forward with heel on ground and toes up
Hinge at hips and lean forward with flat back
Place hands on left thigh for support
Hold, then switch sides
cues: Feel the stretch behind the knee and thigh

exercises.name: Seated Hamstring Stretch
instructions: Sit on floor with legs extended straight in front
Keep back tall and core engaged
Hinge at hips and reach toward toes
Keep knees straight but not locked
Hold the stretch at your edge
cues: Breathe deeply and relax into the stretch

exercises.name: Lying Hamstring Stretch
instructions: Lie on back with both legs extended
Lift right leg toward ceiling, keeping knee straight
Loop a strap or band around foot for assistance
Gently pull leg toward you until stretch is felt
Hold, then switch sides
cues: Keep opposite leg flat on ground

exercises.name: Kneeling Hip Flexor Stretch
instructions: Start in a half-kneeling position with right foot forward
Keep front knee at 90 degrees, aligned over ankle
Tuck pelvis under and squeeze glutes
Shift weight slightly forward until stretch is felt in left hip
Hold, then switch sides
cues: Add arm reach overhead for deeper stretch

exercises.name: Pigeon Pose
instructions: Start in a plank or all-fours position
Bring right knee forward toward right wrist
Extend left leg straight back behind you
Square hips toward the front of the mat
Fold forward over front leg or stay upright
cues: Use a pillow under hip if needed
Keep back leg straight and toes pointed

exercises.name: Figure Four Stretch
instructions: Lie on back with knees bent and feet flat
Cross right ankle over left knee, creating a figure four
Reach hands through and grab behind left thigh
Gently pull left thigh toward chest
Hold, then switch sides
cues: Keep head and shoulders relaxed on floor
Flex the crossed foot to protect the knee

exercises.name: Standing Calf Stretch
instructions: Stand facing a wall, arms length away
Place hands on wall at shoulder height
Step right leg back, keeping it straight with heel on floor
Bend left knee and lean into wall
Hold, then switch sides
cues: Keep back heel pressed into floor
For deeper stretch, step back foot further

exercises.name: Ankle Circles
instructions: Sit or stand with one foot lifted off ground
Rotate foot in a circular motion from the ankle
Complete circles in one direction, then reverse
Keep movement controlled and full range
Switch to other ankle
cues: Make circles as large as comfortable
Can be done seated or standing

exercises.name: Doorway Chest Stretch
instructions: Stand in a doorway with arms bent at 90 degrees
Place forearms on door frame, elbows at shoulder height
Step one foot forward through doorway
Lean forward until stretch is felt across chest
Hold and breathe deeply
cues: Try different arm heights to target different chest fibers
Keep core engaged and avoid arching back

exercises.name: Cross-Body Shoulder Stretch
instructions: Stand or sit tall with shoulders relaxed
Bring right arm across chest at shoulder height
Use left hand to gently press right arm closer to body
Keep right shoulder down, not shrugged
Hold, then switch sides
cues: Feel stretch in back of shoulder

exercises.name: Overhead Tricep Stretch
instructions: Stand or sit tall with good posture
Raise right arm overhead and bend elbow
Reach right hand down between shoulder blades
Use left hand to gently press right elbow back
Hold, then switch sides
cues: Keep head neutral, not pushed forward

exercises.name: Standing Lat Stretch
instructions: Stand arm's length from a wall or sturdy surface
Raise right arm and place palm on wall overhead
Step right foot behind left and lean hips away from wall
Feel stretch along right side of torso
Hold, then switch sides
cues: Reach through fingertips for deeper stretch

exercises.name: Neck Side Stretch
instructions: Sit or stand tall with shoulders relaxed
Gently tilt right ear toward right shoulder
Place right hand on left side of head for gentle pressure
Keep left shoulder down and relaxed
Hold, then switch sides
cues: Breathe deeply and relax into stretch

exercises.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
instructions: Start on hands and knees in tabletop position
Inhale: Drop belly, lift chest and tailbone (Cow)
Exhale: Round spine, tuck chin and pelvis (Cat)
Flow smoothly between positions with breath
Continue for desired duration
cues: Perform for 60-90 seconds or 10-15 breath cycles

exercises.name: Child's Pose
instructions: Kneel on floor with big toes together
Sit back on heels and separate knees hip-width or wider
Fold forward, extending arms in front or alongside body
Rest forehead on floor
Relax and breathe deeply
cues: Widen knees for more hip opening
Use a pillow under torso if needed

exercises.name: Downward Dog
instructions: Start on hands and knees in tabletop position
Tuck toes and lift hips up and back
Straighten legs and arms, forming an inverted V shape
Press chest toward thighs, heels toward floor
Keep head between arms, gaze toward navel
cues: Bend knees slightly if hamstrings are tight
Spread fingers wide and press through whole hand

exercises.name: World's Greatest Stretch
instructions: Start in a push-up position
Step right foot outside right hand into deep lunge
Drop left elbow toward floor inside right foot
Rotate and reach right arm toward ceiling
Return to start and switch sides
cues: Hold each position 3-5 seconds, 5 reps each side
Keep back leg straight and engaged
Move through full range of motion

exercises.name: Front Leg Swings
instructions: Stand sideways to a wall, hand on wall for balance
Shift weight to inside leg
Swing outside leg forward and back in controlled motion
Keep torso upright and core engaged
Complete reps, then switch sides

exercises.name: Arm Circles
instructions: Stand tall with arms extended out to sides at shoulder height
Make small circular motions with arms
Gradually increase circle size
Reverse direction halfway through
Keep core engaged throughout
cues: Start small and progressively increase size

exercises.name: IT Band Foam Roll
instructions: Lie on right side with foam roller under outer thigh
Support upper body with right forearm
Stack or stagger legs for balance
Roll slowly from hip to just above knee
Pause on tender spots for 20-30 seconds
cues: Avoid rolling directly on knee or hip bone
Control pressure with supporting arm and leg

exercises.name: Quad Foam Roll
instructions: Lie face down with foam roller under thighs
Support upper body on forearms
Roll slowly from hip to just above knee
Rotate leg slightly to target inner and outer quad
Pause on tender spots
cues: Keep core engaged to protect lower back

exercises.name: Upper Back Foam Roll
instructions: Lie on back with foam roller under upper back
Bend knees with feet flat on floor
Cross arms over chest or support head with hands
Lift hips and roll from mid-back to upper back
Pause on tight areas
cues: Extend over roller to open chest
